headline: Rising Clean Energy Demand Fuels Renewed Interest in Nuclear Stocks
summary: Investors looking to build a nuclear-focused portfolio may find strong opportunities in companies such as BWX Technologies, Dominion Energy and Duke Energy.

headline: Southern (SO): Is There Hidden Value After a Steady Share Price Climb?
summary: Southern (SO) shares have edged higher over the past month, rising around 4%. Investors watching utility stocks may note Southern’s steady, gradual gains, with a broader focus on dependable income and modest growth in the sector. See our latest analysis for Southern. Southern’s share price momentum has been gradually picking up, with a steady climb that reflects renewed interest in utilities as a stable income play. The latest 1-year total shareholder return of 11% highlights consistent...

headline: Southern Company: Data Center Expansion Bullish And Market Is Overlooking Its Nuclear Facilities
summary: Southern Company is well-positioned to benefit from surging electricity demand, driven by data centers, AI, and cloud computing expansion. Read why SO is a Hold.
